Package maze

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
maze.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
A Maze represents a three dimensional maze of given dimensions. It consists of Walls which are its building components and Entities throughout the Maze.
Version:
05262024
Author:
Dhruv Solanki, Ohm Bhakta, Yujun Lee

      Returns:
      the number of monsters to be removed

    • checkInteractableInteraction

      public int checkInteractableInteraction(Player p)
      Checks if the player is interacting with an interactable
      Parameters:
      p - the player that interacts in the maze
      Returns:
      1 if the player is interacting with a store, 2 if the player is interacting with a finish, -1 if not

    • checkWall

      public boolean checkWall(int x, int y, int z)
      Checks if the given grid is a wall
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate in the grid
      y - the y-coordinate in the grid
      z - the z-coordinate in the grid
      Returns:
      true if the location is a wall

    • gridToPoint

      public float[] gridToPoint(int x, int y, int z)
      Converts the given grid location to PApplet coordinate points
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate in the grid
      y - the y-coordinate in the grid
      z - the z-coordinate in the grid
      Returns:
      the size 3 float grid containing the x, y, and z coordinate points
